summary:
Are enemies too weak? Do you want to usually seal your power?
This mod is recommended for such you.
This mod adds negative enchantment effects.
Enchanted weapons are good for presents for too strong follower and hateful follower.
descriptionHtml:
Negative Enchantment Effects

Description
Are enemies too weak? Do you want to usually seal your power?
This mod is recommended for such you.
This mod adds negative enchantment effects.
Enchanted weapons are good for presents for too strong follower and hateful follower.

Details
This mod adds negative enchantment effects.

Those necessary for the operation
Skyrim 1.9.32+


Installation
Negative Enchantment Effects_guard1.esp put on Date folder.

Uninstallation
Please delete the file that you added during installation.

How to use
There is cuarsed daedora equipment in treasure chest put on the room of Farengar in Dragonsreach.
When you disenchant these, you get negative enchantment effects.

Credit
Guard No.1 :Whiterun guard
twitter:white0guard0

Permission
You must get permission from me before you are allowed to modify my files to improve it.

Change log
July 1, 2014 Release 1.0
author: Guard Number 1
